clusterList.phrase: and also for the players that haven't been picked and think they should be there it's a great opportunity to show over the next six weeks plus semi finals that they have the form to warrant a position in the team
with the advent of perhaps 40 more games and 26 or 28 of those in melbourne they've got to be played somewhere
we are really looking forward to the challenge of playing hawthorn given what happened last time

so it's very important test there's always a lot of tension in every test you are involved in particularly the big ones australia south africa and a number of others so there's always a lot of tension around a test match and that's the way it should be

there's 14 teams in france and only four in australia so there's a lot more opportunity over here to get a start and play in a premier competition whereas the opportunities in australia may be a little more limited
we had a productive test at jerez especially on the second day the team have done some great work in the development of the f2008 and i'm confident for hungary

they have a lot of character work hard and have persistence in terms of the challenges we are going to have at camp i'm sure they will have that mindset that they want to have a great team so i'm sure they will be pushing the pace
we will have to put up runs on the board and i think our bowling and fielding are good enough to defend the 200 plus score
they have a team capable of challenging for promotion against st mirren and hamilton last week they did not look out of place and they did really well at airdrie in the first half

any time you get good battles in test cricket it is great people are saying with twenty20 around that test cricket is going to die but i don't think it is people still want to come to watch it and to get exciting afternoons like that what more do you want
if there is the tiniest doubt about them they will not compete
they are smart players and they have been around so we expect them to fill in and play as well as we expect them to
i think in the six test matches we've played this year they're really trying to do the business as to whether they're going to be good enough

it's a tough one because it would be cool for wellington to be in a final we've only been going 18 months albeit a pre-season one but that won't be the focal point for the game it'll be around the performance i think if we get a decent performance that making the final may take care of itself

and also for the players that haven't been picked and think they should be there it's a great opportunity to show over the next six weeks plus semifinals that they have the form to warrant a position in the team
we're still not in our best physical condition but we will be ready for the preliminaries matches which we're really looking forward to

and also for the players that haven't been picked and think they should be there it's a great opportunity to show over the next six weeks plus semi-finals that they have the form to warrant a position in the team
we are expecting india to come back hard they were under a lot of pressure and we expect them to fight hard in this test
